news.name:
Самое глобальное обновление
на нашем сервере
news.desc: I need to apply a white to transparent gradient which covers about a 1/4 of the top of the page and a background image visible for the rest of the page. Im looking to achieve a seamless blend from a gradient to a textured image and to do this in CSS3.
